subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Zach Parise scored both goals for the Devils, including the winner with 48.3 seconds remaining, and Martin Brodeur made 42 saves Saturday in a 2-1 victory over the Maple Leafs in Toronto.
snippet: Zach Parise scored both goals for the Devils, including the winner with 48.3 seconds remaining, and Martin Brodeur made 42 saves Saturday in a 2-1 victory over the Maple Leafs in Toronto.
